title: NFL Typeface seen on Combine Jerseys and Sideline Gear
content:
NFL Typeface seen on Combine Jerseys and Sideline Gear

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003721im_/http:/typophile.com/files/09000d5d806db60c_gallery_600_6099.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003721im_/http:/typophile.com/files/p5118576dt_6224.jpg)

 [‹ Battle for Kids](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003721/http:/typophile.com/node/50212 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need help with 20s font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003721/http:/typophile.com/node/50214 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tbconnor

comments.content:
I suspect this may be custom, since marketing is king with sports leagues, but [ITC Stenberg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010003721/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/stenberg/) is similar.

- Mike Yanega
